PickUp.QuestName: They Have Allies, But So Do We

CustomBehavior.Text: Glaive Thrower will run into walls everywhere. Not at all reliable. Please do manually! Restart bot once quest is complete and you have dismounted the Thrower!

CustomBehavior.Text: This may take a while for the encounter to start, don't be alarmed
